state.response: انسانوں کے پاس عمومًا 24 پسلیاں ہوتی ہیں
انسانوں کے پاس عمومًا 24 پسلیاں ہوتی ہیں

Humans generally have 24 ribs: How many ribs do humans have? Number of ribs in human body

It's also called your thoracic cage. Your 24 ribs (12 on each side) wrap around the sides of your torso from front to back. They connect to your thoracic spine in the back and your sternum (breastbone) in the front.
How many ribs do humans have? Number of ribs in human body
The vast majority of humans are born with 24 ribs, 12 on each side of the body. Contrary to a widely held misconception, males and females have the same number of ribs.
